content.text: Welcome to the home page of ISCJS!
Click $url:link0[here] for a quick introduction to ISCJS and what it does.

To transpile a single file run the command

iscjs <file-name>

To transpile all files present within a directory run the command

iscjs <directory-name>

Running the following command will transpile all InfinityScript files present in the current working directory.

iscjs .
Click on the Download button at the bottom right corner of this page to get the latest release.

footer.text: Download latest Release ?
